lom:description.lom:string: The WebCASPAR database provides easy access to a large body of statistical data resources for science and engineering (S&E) at U.S. academic institutions. WebCASPAR emphasizes S&E, but its data resources also provide information on non-S&E fields and higher education in general.

lom:title.lom:string: WebCASPER : Integrated Science and Engineering Resource Data System

lom:contribute.lom:entity: BEGIN:VCARD VERSION:3.0 SOURCE:http://www.smete.org UID:E2A12CBD-B254-4A26-8DF4-CB996072066A N:National Science Foundation (NSF);WebCASPAR;null;; FN:WebCASPAR National Science Foundation (NSF) END:vCard
